services.title: Quality Assurance

services.title: User Interface Adjustments
services.description: User interface adjustments on an ad-hoc basis.

services.title: Product Consulting
services.description: Working closely with you in order to guide costs and feature development.

services.title: Software Documentation
services.description: Ensure that all development configurations and enviroments are properly documented for future developer handoff.

deliverables.title: Technical Specification
deliverables.description: This document clearly lists every feature and task that the developer must include to ensure a smooth, client approved, development cycle.

deliverables.title: Annotated Code
deliverables.description: Complicated functions and files will have annotations to better describe details for new developers to pick up where we left off.

services.title: Internal Software Insurance Policy
services.description: Internal systems (features that do not require API keys from third parties to function) are fully covered for 180 days from the start of this agreement. This policy is void if any unauthorized modifications were made to WAMI software, any WAMI related cloud infrastructure (such as on AWS) and any of the WAMI servers' configurations by any individual outside of Inventum Digital.
